div.div: Map of occurrence records for the 55 species that were modelled in the world’s oceans, including the Gulf.
div.p: Source: Natural Earth version 4.0.0 - http://www.naturalearthdata.com/. Figure created using MATLAB.
(TIF)
Click here for additional data file.

div.div: Percent change in habitat suitability forall non-fish species in the Economic Exclusive Zones (EEZs) of the Gulf in 2090.
div.p: Results are presented for the RCP 8.5 scenario and as average of the three niche models (BIOCLIM, NPPEN and ENFA). The error bars represent inter-model range.
(TIF)
Click here for additional data file.

div.div: Top 47 species important to fisheries in the region.
div.p: Species are ordered by average catch size (tonnes).
(DOCX)
Click here for additional data file.

div.div: Characteristics of all the priority marine species in the Gulf (ordered alphabetically) as obtained from FishBase [ 44], SeaLifeBase [ 45] and IUCN red list of threatened species [ 106].
div.p: TL–Trophic level. CR–Critically Endangered, EN–Endangered, VU–Vulnerable, NT–Near Threatened, LC–Least Concern, Data Deficient, NE–Not Evaluated.
(DOCX)
